member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraSpreadsheet.SpreadsheetControl.AcceptsEscape

summary.para: Gets or sets a value indicating whether pressing the ESC key is processed by the SpreadsheetControl.

member.value: true if the input ESC key is processed by the SpreadsheetControl, otherwise false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraSpreadsheet.SpreadsheetControl.AcceptsReturn

summary.para: Gets or sets a value indicating whether pressing the RETURN key is processed by the SpreadsheetControl.

member.value: true if the input RETURN key is processed by the SpreadsheetControl, otherwise false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraSpreadsheet.SpreadsheetControl.AcceptsTab

summary.para: Gets or sets a value indicating whether pressing the TAB key is processed by the SpreadsheetControl instead of moving the focus to the next control in the tab order.

member.value: true if the input TAB key is processed by the SpreadsheetControl, otherwise false.

summary.para: Adds the specified service to the service container.

This property is not in effect for the SpreadsheetControl class.
Occurs before the SpreadsheetControl control is released from memory.
Occurs before the document is saved (exported to a certain format).
Occurs before a document is loaded (imported from an external source).

member.param: The object to output the document to.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraSpreadsheet.SpreadsheetControl.SelectedCell

summary.para: Gets or sets an active cell in the active worksheet.

member.value: A object specifying an active cell in a worksheet that is currently active. If you assign a cell located in a worksheet that is not active, the active cell will be specified in the active worksheet.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraSpreadsheet.SpreadsheetControl.Selection

summary.para: Gets or sets a cell range selected in the active worksheet.

member.value: A object specifying the range of cells selected in a worksheet that is currently active. If you assign a cell range located in a worksheet that is not active, the selected range will be specified in the active worksheet.

summary.para: Fires in response to changing cell selection in a worksheet.
Occurs after a new worksheet has been added into a workbook.
Occurs after a worksheet has been removed from a workbook.
Occurs after a worksheet has been renamed.
Occurs when a worksheet is about to be renamed.
Invokes the Print dialog.
Invokes the Print Preview window.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraSpreadsheet.SpreadsheetControl.ToolTipController

summary.para: Gets or sets the tooltip controller component that controls the appearance, position and the content of the hints displayed by the SpreadsheetControl.

member.value: A component which controls the appearance and behavior of the hints displayed by the SpreadsheetControl.

summary.para: This event is raised when an exception unhandled by the SpreadsheetControl occurs.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraSpreadsheet.SpreadsheetControl.Unit

summary.para: Gets or sets a unit of measure used within the control.

member.value: One of the enumeration values.

summary.para: Fires after the property is changed.
Fires before the property is changed.
Raised when changes occur which may affect the control's UI.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraSpreadsheet.SpreadsheetControl.VisibleRange

summary.para: Gets the cell range that is currently visible in the SpreadsheetControl.

member.value: A object specifying the current visible range of cells.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraSpreadsheet.SpreadsheetControl.WorksheetDisplayArea

summary.para: Specifies the maximum number of rows and columns that can be displayed in the SpreadsheetControl for each worksheet.

member.value: A WorksheetDisplayArea object.

summary.para: Occurs when the current zoom level has been changed.
